channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OPEC+ Members Consider Delaying Production Increase, Delegates Say
item.description: OPEC+ members are debating delaying a production increase that was supposed to start next month amid concerns over weak oil prices, delegates in the p...

item.title: Dollar Tree shares plunge 20% after discounter cuts full-year forecast
item.description: Dollar stores, in particular, have felt pinched as their core customer makes trade-offs after a prolonged period of pricier food and everyday costs.

item.title: Should You Include REITs in Your Portfolio? And if So, Which Ones?
item.description: Homeowners and others looking to gain real-estate exposure aren’t getting the diversification they expect, research shows.

item.title: Dick's Sporting Goods blows past earnings estimates but issues cautious guidance ahead of 2024 election
item.description: Theft at Dick's Sporting Goods had previously impacted its profits but the company now appears to be past those issues.

item.title: Temu's Parent, a Victim of Competition or Its Own Success?
item.description: PDD suddenly lost a third of its value following a cautious outlook. Its founder had briefly become China’s richest man.

item.title: Klarna rival Zilch posts first profit and appoints ex-Aviva CEO to board ahead of IPO
item.description: Philip Belamant, Zilch's CEO, told CNBC the firm was able to hit profitability by growing rather than cutting back like other fintechs have done.

item.title: They're Breaking Every Retirement Rule to Be Off Now, Not Later
item.description: Some workers want to spread retirement throughout their careers, even if it means a smaller 401(k).

item.title: MongoDB shares surge as high as 16% on guidance boost
item.description: MongoDB delivered stronger results than analysts had been looking for, partly because of better cloud consumption activity than expected.

item.title: Fears of Economic Slowdown Spark Stock-Market Selloff
item.description: The Dow industrials slid more than 600 points and the Nasdaq Composite shed 3.3%.

item.title: Lululemon cuts guidance, misses sales estimates after botched product launch
item.description: Lululemon's growth in its largest market, the Americas, has slowed from the highs it saw last year as it contends with product rollout challenges.
